snippet: A person of interest in the shooting of a judge last week was charged with murder in an unrelated Houston slaying, the police said.
abstract: Houston officials charge Chimene Hamilton Onyeri with murder in fatal shooting of Jacobi Demon Alexander; Onyeri remains person of interest in unrelated shooting of Judge Julie Kocurek, who was wounded outside her Austin home.
lead_paragraph: A person of interest in the shooting of a judge last week was charged with murder in an unrelated Houston slaying, the police said.

headline.main: Texas: Houston Murder Suspect Is Investigated in Judge’s Shooting
headline.print_headline: Texas: Houston Murder Suspect Is Investigated in Judge’s Shooting
